movie.title: The Avengers
movie.writer: Joss Whedon (screenplay), Zak Penn (story), Joss Whedon (story)
movie.actors: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Mark Ruffalo, Chris Hemsworth
movie.plot: Nick Fury is director of S.H.I.E.L.D, an international peace keeping agency. The agency is a who's who of Marvel Super Heroes, with Iron Man, The Incredible Hulk, Thor, Captain America, Hawkeye and Black Widow. When global security is threatened by Loki and his cohorts, Nick Fury and his team will need all their powers to save the world from disaster.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 31 wins & 66 nominations.
movie.tomatoConsensus: With a script that never forgets its heroes' humanity and no shortage of superpowered set pieces, The Avengers lives up to its hype -- and raises the bar for Marvel at the movies.
